word_mean: 网板拖网中用以连接曳纲和手纲的纲索。

sentence.Network_en: My necklace has a heart pendant, but I don't wear it everyday.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的项链有一个心形的垂饰, 但我并非每天都戴他.

sentence.Network_en: The pendant was hanging by a thin gold chain.
sentence.Network_cn: 那耳环是由一根细金链子吊着的.

sentence.Network_en: Then I try a very delicate butterfly pendant and bracelet that are so feather -light , I almost shoplift them by mistake.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是我又试了一个精巧的蝴蝶结和手镯，这两样东西简直轻如羽毛，我几乎顺手牵羊将它们偷走。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting an architectural decoration projecting downwards): from Old French, literally 'hanging', present participle of the verb pendre, from Latin pendere

entry.def: A pendant is an ornament on a chain that you wear round your neck.

means.word_mean: 1. an adornment that hangs from a piece of jewelry (necklace or earring)
2. branched lighting fixture; often ornate; hangs from the ceiling

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
